test_cases.title: Verify ticket details are displayed correctly for a service request
test_cases.description: Ensure that the ticket details page displays the correct request title, status, workflow stages, ticket number, approval status, due date, quantity, and stage for a given service request.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal.
A valid service request (e.g., RITM3093710) exists.
steps: Select a specific ticket (e.g., RITM3093710) from the list.
test_cases.expected_result: The ticket details page displays the correct request title, status, workflow stages, ticket number, approval status, due date, quantity, and stage.

test_cases.title: Verify the Cancel button is visible and enabled for an open ticket
test_cases.description: Ensure that the Cancel button is visible and enabled when the ticket status is 'Open'.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal.
A service request with status 'Open' exists.
test_cases.expected_result: The Cancel button is visible and enabled.

test_cases.title: Verify workflow stages are displayed with correct status indicators
test_cases.description: Ensure that each workflow stage (e.g., Request Approved, Waiting for Approval, Fulfillment, Completed) is displayed with the correct status indicator (e.g., Approved, Completed, In Progress, Pending).
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal.
A service request with multiple workflow stages exists.
steps: Select a ticket with multiple workflow stages.
test_cases.expected_result: All workflow stages are displayed with their respective status indicators.

test_cases.title: Verify activity stream displays ticket creation entry
test_cases.description: Ensure that the activity stream on the ticket details page displays an entry for ticket creation, including the creator's name and timestamp.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal.
A service request with activity history exists.
steps: Select a ticket with activity history.
test_cases.expected_result: The activity stream displays an entry for ticket creation with the correct user and timestamp.

test_cases.title: Verify user can enter and send a message in the activity stream
test_cases.description: Ensure that the user can type a message in the activity stream input box and send it.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal.
steps: Type a message in the activity stream input box.
test_cases.expected_result: The message is sent and appears in the activity stream.

test_cases.title: Verify navigation path is displayed correctly on the ticket details page
test_cases.description: Ensure that the navigation path (breadcrumb) is displayed as Home > Tickets > [Ticket Number] on the ticket details page.
preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal.
test_cases.expected_result: The navigation path is displayed as Home > Tickets > [Ticket Number].
